title: Why is multilingual education better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, there are plenty of neurological advantages. Scientific findings state that multilingual children are more creative, open minded, and have it easier to learn more languages later on. Besides, it is a constant “brain training” which helps to avoid Alzheimer. Then, it gives the child clear career advantages and various possibilities . Each language is a doorway to a new world. Get free informative videos about raising multilingual children here: www.multilingual.family/sign-up
